laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukopenia and thrombocytopenia with deranged coagulation.
Hypoxemia (PaO2 78 mmHg on 6 L/min oxygen flows).

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Confirmed on Day 10 with multiple thin-wall cavitary lesions suggestive of pneumatoceles.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed multiple thin-wall cavitary lesions suggestive of pneumatoceles.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: On Day 22, post-thoracentesis revealed right hydropneumothorax which increased over the next 4 days.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Loculated right hydropneumothorax with no evidence of an air-fluid level in the cavitary lesion.
